examples.example: 在全年的工作中，他始终保持着积极进取的态度，取得了非常出色的成绩。

translate.english: In the whole year's work, he has always maintained a proactive attitude and achieved very excellent results.

examples.example: 这全年的经历都让我收获满满，成长了许多。

translate.english: The experiences throughout the whole year have all made me gain a lot and grow a lot.

examples.example: 在全年的生活中，我都充满着热情与活力，积极拥抱每一个美好的日子。

translate.english: In the whole year's life, I am always full of enthusiasm and vitality, and actively embrace every beautiful day.
